hours_text:
# Membership in the Sidney Museum and Arts Association

  * ## Individual Member

$2525$

Perfect for one person

Valid for one year

Select

    * 10% discount on taxable purchases over $10 at the gallery
    * Quarterly newsletter
    * Invitations to all events, classes, receptions, art shows
    * Cast one vote at any member meeting
    * Volunteer opportunities
    * Serve on Board of Directors
    * Free admission to the Log Cabin Museum and Sidney Museum

  * ## Family Membership

$3535$

two adults & children under 18 living in the same household

Valid for one year

Select

    * 10% discount on all taxable purchases over $10
    * Quarterly newsletter
    * Invitations to all events, classes, receptions and art shows
    * Volunteer opportunities at the Sidney Art Gallery & Museums
    * Family casts one vote at any member meeting

  * ## Sustaining Member

$6060$

All adults and children in a household

Valid for one year

Select

    * 10% discount on taxable purchases over $10
    * Invitations for events, classes, receptions, and art shows
    * Quarterly newsletter
    * Volunteer opportunities at art gallery or museums

  * ## Patron Member

$100100$

All members of household and NARM membership

Valid for one year

Select

    * 10% discount on taxable purchases over $10 at art gallery
    * Covers all members of household
    * Family casts one vote at all member meetings
    * Quarterly newsletter
    * Reciprocal member in NARM (North American Reciprocal M...

collections_text:
### Sidney Museum and Arts Association

Preserving History ~ Promoting Art

The Sidney Museum and Arts Association, a nonprofit organization founded in 1970, is dedicated to preserving local history and promoting local and regional artists and appreciation of fine arts. We are member driven and 100% volunteer.

Sidney Art Gallery is open most Saturdays, 11 am to 4 pm and Sundays 1 pm to 4 pm every week, Monday through Thursday from 11 am to 3 pm or 4 pm as we have available volunteers, or by appointment. Call 360-876-3693 for more information.

[Get Involved](https://sidneymuseumandarts.com/get-involved/)

## Sidney Museum and Arts Association

501(c)(3)

[MEMBERSHIP](https://www.smaashopping.com/plans-pricing)

The Sidney Museum and Arts Association is a 501(c)(3) non-profit membership organization established in 1970 that maintains the Sidney Art Gallery, the Sidney Museum and the Log Cabin Museum in Port Orchard, WA. 

There is no charge, but donations are gladly accepted to help offset the cost of maintenance.

[](https://sidneymuseumandarts.com/classes/)

[Click here for the list of classes coming up](https://sidneymuseumandarts.com/classes/)

# 

# Sixth Folk Music Gathering at the Gallery

Join us on Sunday, January 18, 2026 starting at noon for the Sixth Folk Music Gathering at the Gallery. Enjoy light refreshments and listen to some great music from these very talented local musicians.
